definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: Three is afraid of in some way yet but would have died, free grudge.
sentences.chinese: 三是怕某些心愿尚未了却便就此撒手西去，空余遗恨。

sentences.english: On any free time, she would have the obnoxiously busy job at the coffee shop across the street from campus.
sentences.chinese: 空余的时间会在学校对街热闹的咖啡店打工。

sentences.english: I afraid we have no vacant suite room, would you mind having a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，你介意改定双人间吗？

sentences.english: Have a great plan for your next weekend or freetime?
sentences.chinese: 为你下个周末或空余时间做好安排了吗？

sentences.english: Jim spends much of his free time driving the bus for the blind children.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆把大部分空余时间用去为盲童开车了。

sentences.english: Between the two floors there is empty space which is thesize of the whole floor.
sentences.chinese: 两层楼之间有一块相当于整层楼那么大的空余空间。

sentences.english: Nurturing your spirituality is one of the best ways to sneak time in for yourself every day.
sentences.chinese: 养精蓄锐是每天给自己空余更多时间的最好方法之一。

sentences.english: In his spare time he has traveled to all seven continents. Follow him on Twitter @cqchoi.
sentences.chinese: 空余时间，他足迹遍布七大洲。

sentences.english: I have to take the Yellow Crane to spare here, Yellow Crane Tower.
sentences.chinese: 昔人已乘黄鹤去，此地空余黄鹤楼。

sentences.english: Tariel : How do you spend your free time ?
sentences.chinese: 你是怎样过你的空余时间的？

sentences.english: Let students read this unit. Read this unit.
sentences.chinese: 空余时间让学生进行朗读前面的课文，以读促学。

sentences.english: She devotes all her spare time to looking after her sick mother.
sentences.chinese: 她把所有的空余时间都花在赐顾帮衬生病的母亲上。

sentences.english: I'm afraid we haven't vacancy suits. Would you mind having a double room instead?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，您介意改定双人间吗？

sentences.english: I'm sorry to tell you that we have no vacant suites, would you mind order a double room?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套间了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: We are afraid that there are not any vacant suits available now, do you mind changing to book double rooms?
sentences.chinese: 我们恐怕没有空余的套件了，您介意改订双人间吗？

sentences.english: Blanca: I'm interested in a one-bed room. Do you have any available?
sentences.chinese: 我对单床客房有兴趣。您有空余的吗？

definition: to make (some time or space) available (for sb)
to set sth aside/to let sth lie idle/idle/unused
to leave sth unused/to lie idle
as empty as anything (idiom); completely bereft/to have nothing/vacuous/hollow/empty (argument, head etc)
